author: trimetilo
content:
Hello. I am still investigating why blobscan is not indexing any blobs atm.

In devnet6 we moved from lighthouse to lodestar and apparently the endpoints are different.
Could you help me understanding why the endpoint to retrieve blobs in lodestar is `/eth/v1/beacon/blob_sidecars/<block_id>` while in lighthouse is `/eth/v1/beacon/blobs/<blob_id>`? Are they the correct endpoints to query?

author: parithosh
content: I think the API says it should be: `/eth/v1/beacon/blob_sidecars/{block_id}` (https://ethereum.github.io/beacon-APIs/?urls.primaryName=v2.4.1), so the lh one must be wrong? <@491624610215886849> <@607055410104500244>
